description: 101 Ways (the things a girl will do to keep her Volvo) chronicles the epic adventures of Watson (Wendy Hoopes), a struggling young writer who moves to the quiet suburbs to write her first novel. A New York City native, Watson isn'...
name: 101 Ways (The Things a Girl Will Do to Keep Her Volvo)

original_info.id: 101 Ways (The Things a Girl Will Do to Keep Her Volvo)_2000
original_info.name: 101 Ways (The Things a Girl Will Do to Keep Her Volvo)

review.name: Refreshingly funny and witty....laugh out loud!
review.reviewBody: I viewed 101 Ways at a screening in Manhattan and enjoyed every second of it! It's a cleverly written, light hearted story with characters whose plights almost every young adult can relate to. The witty dialogue and subtle humor make you laugh out loud. The script and the acting is refreshingly funny and the film is thoroughly enjoyable! I loved it!
